content:
What are the names of the individuals mentioned in this [XML data] text and what was the exact date and location of the late night jam session where they wrote out the first draft of "Let It Be"? Here is the [XML data] code: John Lennon Paul McCartney George Harrison Ringo Starr Let It Be

The four of us gathered at Twickenham Film Studios on January 3, 1969 for a late night jam session. We wrote out the first draft of "Let It Be" and recorded it on January 31, 1969 at Apple Studios in London.

The individuals mentioned in the XML data are John Lennon, Paul McCartney, George Harrison, and Ringo Starr. The late night jam session where they wrote out the first draft of "Let It Be" took place on January 3, 1969, at Twickenham Film Studios.
